string.text: Turning this on will allow any conversion kits on valid waepons.\n /nNOTE: Highlights on kits will not update until reloading your save.
%c[d_red]This weapon must be in your own inventory first!
%c[d_red]This weapon cannot accept that conversion. Try again.
%c[d_green]You have successfully converted you weapon with the

This specialty upgrade kit allows the user to convert suitable pistols and SMGs to use 9x19mm ammunition.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] SUITABLE WEAPON CLASSES: Pistol, SMG
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] TO USE: Drag this item onto a suitable weapon in your backpack
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] WEAPON MUST NOT BE EQUIPPED WHEN ATTEMPTING TO CONVERT
